name: Kunoichi Karin
description:
The time is the Edo period-- a girl who works at a dumpling shop, her name is Karin.At night,
she spends her days stealing money and goods from rich people in Edo as Komachi, a nice thief.
A strange incident that happens there.
Gradually creeping in will be the shadow of a vengeful demon that spins karma-- his Edo fantasy
​
